recipe.title: Grilled Steak with Parsley-Parmesan Salad
ingredients: 3 tablespoons olive oil, divided, plus more
instructions: Rub steak with 2 tablespoons oil; season generously with salt and pepper. Let sit at room temperature 30 minutes. Prepare a grill for medium-high heat; oil grill grate. Grill steak to desired doneness, 5–7 minutes per side for medium-rare. Let rest 5 minutes before slicing against the grain. Meanwhile, toss parsley, Parmesan, lemon juice, and remaining 1 tablespoon oil in a medium bowl; season with salt, pepper, and more lemon juice, if desired. Serve steak topped with parsley-Parmesan salad.
